name: Supercell Slam
effect: If the Accuracy Roll is unsuccessful or the target is unaffected, deal 5 Dice of Damage to the User. -1 Accuracy. If the target has used the move Minimize during the scene gain an additional +2 Damage Dice and Never Fail.
description: The user unleashes a gigavolt that it aims to slam into its foe. The move archs back to the user if it fails to land however...
